|Actor = [[JĂłn ĂžĂłr Birgisson]]}}AÂ '''musicianÂ '''â€‹is an unnamed minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. He is played by guest star [[JĂłn ĂžĂłr Birgisson]] andÂ only appears in "[[The Lion and the Rose]]".

[[JĂłn ĂžĂłr Birgisson]] is currently a member of the Icelandic post-rock band [http://www.sigur-ros.co.uk/ sigur rĂłs] which do a cover of "[[The Rains of Castamere (song)|The Rains of Castamere]]" for the closing credits of the episode "[[The Lion and the Rose]]".
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, "[[The Rains of Castamere (song)|The Rains of Castamere]]" is performed several times at the Purple Wedding by musicians such as Hamish the Harper and Collio Quaynis.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
He is a musician who performs in a group with two others, in which he sings and plays the accordion.
===â€‹[[Season 4]]===
His group perform "[[The Rains of Castamere (song)|The Rains of Castamere]]" at the [[Purple Wedding]], though King [[Joffrey Baratheon]] quickly grows bored with their performance and throws coins at them. They pick up as many coins as they can before leaving.<ref>"[[The Lion and the Rose]]"</ref>
